title: Tim
body:
<<if visited("Tim") is false>>
Tim: Thanks for volunteering, Norra. We can always use an extra hand around here.
Tim: If you ever need to know where to go, just come check in with me.
<<else>>
Norra: Hi, Tim.
Tim: Hi.
<<endif>>

<<if visited("Fiona") is false>>
Tim: If you're looking for something to do, Fiona could use a hand.
Tim: She's probably down by the aviary.
<<else>>
<<if $received_supply_list_from_Fiona is true>>
Norra: Fiona said she needs to keys to the aviary.
Tim: Oh, okay.
Tim: Let's go into the toolshed. 
Tim: But not in a creepy way. . . 
<<move Tim ToolShed>>
<<move Norra ToolShed>>
<<else>>
Tim: I think Fiona could use your help. Everyone else is all set for now.
<<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: Tim.ToolShed.Shears
body: Tim: Fiona needs help feeding her budgies, not trimming her bushes.

title: Tim.ToolShed.Axe
body: Tim: Where do you think you're going with that?!

title: Tim.ToolShed
body:
<<if $have_seed is true and $have_keys is true>>
Tim: Great. The key to the aviary is the little silver one.
<<move Tim ToolShedExit>>
<<move Norra ToolShedExit>>
<<else>>
Tim: Quit messing around. 
Tim: Fiona needs the keys to the aviary and the birdseed.
Tim: And I need to get back to my emails.
<<endif>>
